Module Google::Cloud::Vision::V1::ProductSearch =======

Module ProductSearch >>>>>>> 955c59f (asdf)

Manages Products and ProductSets of reference images for use in product search. It uses the following resource model:

  • The API has a collection of ProductSet resources, named <<<<<<< HEAD projects/*/locations/*/productSets/*, which acts as a way to put different ======= projects/*/locations/*/productSets/*, which acts as a way to put different >>>>>>> 955c59f (asdf) products into groups to limit identification.

In parallel,

  • The API has a collection of Product resources, named <<<<<<< HEAD projects/*/locations/*/products/*

  • Each Product has a collection of ReferenceImage resources, named projects/*/locations/*/products/*/referenceImages/*

    ======= projects/*/locations/*/products/*

  • Each Product has a collection of ReferenceImage resources, named projects/*/locations/*/products/*/referenceImages/*

    >>>>>>> 955c59f (asdf)

To load this service and instantiate a client:

require "google/cloud/vision/v1/product_search"
client = ::Google::Cloud::Vision::V1::ProductSearch::Client.new
